titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1591) making emergency supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2007, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-64, by Ms. Slaughter.

All points of order against consideration of the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. The amendment printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 29.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 261.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 201 (Roll no. 182).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/22/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1591 (U.S. Troop Readiness, Veterans' Health, and Iraq Accountability Act, 2007).
